thread.section_title: The Kimberly Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One night stay
thread.title_full: One night stay - Review of The Kimberly Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: carmanno
title: One night stay
text: Checked in for one night and couldn't of asked for anything better. Traveling with kids is already difficult, finding a hotel in NYC with separate sleeping and living areas and a kitchenette at an affordable rate made it so much easier. From the moment we pulled up we were greeted with a friendly attitude and it continued every moment of the trip. The location was amazing. First class hotel! Quiet but just a short walk to everything we needed. Booked again for the end of summer this time for 2 nights. Can't wait, see you soon!
